posts.title: 使用 LaTeX 创建文档
posts.text: LaTeX 是一个非常强大的, 用来创建文档的工具. 它是基于所谓的 ‘WYSIWYM’ (what you see is what you mean) 思想. 这意味着你只需要把所有的精力放在你文档的内容上, 而电脑会帮你完成格式的问题. 通过 LaTeX, 创建一份看起来非常专业规范的文档是一件很容易的事. 本文介绍一下利用 LaTeX 来创建文档的基础知识. Introduction我们以一个最简单的例子开始:123456\documentclass{article} \begin{document}First document. This is a simple example, with no extra parameters or packages included.\end{document} 输入文件可以是一个简单的 text 文档, 但是其后缀为 .tex. 此输入文件将包含电脑会翻译并编译成 PDF 文件的源代码. 源代码的第一行申明了文档的类型, 在上述例子中类型为 article. 然后, 在 \begin{document} 标签与 \end{document} 标签之间, 我们写入文档的内容. 注意: 了解如何生成输出文件 (PDF), 请看这篇关于编译的文章. 前言部分在前面的例子当中, 文字内容是在命令 \begin{document} 后输入的. 在整个 .tex 文件中, 命令 \begin{document} 前面的部分通常称为前言(preamble). 在前言中, 你可以定义的想要写的文档的类型以及语言, 加载你需要的额外的宏包(packages) 以及设立几个参数. 举个栗子, 一个标准的文档前言部分通常为这个样子:123456\documentclass[12pt, letterpaper]{article}\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc} \title{First document}\author{Hubert Farnsworth \thanks{funded by the ShareLaTeX team}}\date{February 2014} 下面我们来详细介绍每一行的意思:1\documentclass[12pt, letterpaper]{article} 正如前面所说, 此行定义了文件的类型(article). 我们可以看到一些在方括号里的额外的参数被加入到命令, 并且它们是通过逗号来分离的. 在这个例子里, 通过额外的参数我们设置了字体大小为 (12pt) 和纸张大小 (letterpaper). 当然别的文字大小 (9pt, 11pt, 12pt) 也是可以的, 一般默认的大小为 10pt. 至于纸张大小, 也有一些其它选项, 比如说 A4 和 legalpaper. 注意 ShareLaTeX 使用的是欧洲的 LaTeX 标准, 所以通常默认的纸张大小是 A4. 请参考 纸张大小和页边空白 这篇文章了解使用 Geometry 宏包设置格式参数的信息.1\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc} 这是关于文档的编码信息, 它允许我们文档内容里使用额外的而又不在 ASCII 中的字符, 比如说 à, ü, č 等. 我们也可以更改编码设置甚至不设置编码, 不过通常推荐使用 utf-8. 除非你想用别的编码或者你不确定, 最好还是把这行加载前言部分. 接下来的三行代码是直接看命令名也能猜到是什么意思. 如果说你看不懂这些英文(额这个在当下几率还是太小了吧), 在下面我们将会看到它们起什么作用. 下面是另两个非常重要的能加到 \documentclass 命令中的参数. 如果你想要你的文档为双栏模式, 则我们可以使用参数是 twocolumn . 又或者你想使用双面打印文档, 我们可以使用参数 twoside. 为你的文档显示标题为文档显示标题, 你需要在前言声明它的各个组成部分然后加上一些额外的代码:123456789101112131415161718\documentclass[12pt, letterpaper, twoside]{article}\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc} \title{First document}\author{Hubert Farnsworth \thanks{funded by the ShareLaTeX team}}\date{February 2014} \begin{document} \begin{titlepage}\maketitle\end{titlepage} In this document some extra packages and parameterswere added. There is an encoding packageand pagesize and fontsize parameters. \end{document} 这个例子里, 在前言中有一个三行的代码块, 它定义了被包含在标题页面中的相关信息.123\title{First document}This is the title.\author{Hubert Farnsworth} Here you put the name(s) of the author(s) and, as an optional parameter, you can add the next command:1\thanks{funded by the ShareLaTeX team} This can be added after the name of the author, inside the braces of the title command. It will add a superscript and a footnote with the text inside the braces. Useful if you need to thank an institution in your article.1\date{February 2014} You can enter the date manually or use the command \today so the date will be updated automatically at the time you compile your document.Once you have that in the preamble now in the body of your document you can use the next commands for the information to be printed.1\begin{titlepage} \end{titlepage} This declares an environment, a block of code with a specific behaviour depending on its type. 在此情形下, 不管你加入什么内容到 titlepage 环境(即 \begin{titlepage} 与 \end{titlepage} 之间)中, 它都会出现在你文档的第一页.1\maketitle This command will print the title, the author and the date in the format shown in the example. If it’s not enclosed in a titlepage environment, it will be shown at the beginning of the document, above the first line. Basic formatting: abstract, paragraphs and newlinesEverything included inside the \begin{document} \end{document} commands will be rendered in the final document. 1234567891011121314151617\documentclass[12pt, letterpaper, twoside]{article}\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc} \begin{document} \begin{abstract}This is a simple paragraph at the beginning of the document. A brief introduction to the main subject.\end{abstract} In this document some extra packages and parameterswere added. There is an encoding package,and pagesize and fontsize parameters. This line will start a second paragraph. And I can brake\\ the lines \\ and continue on a new line. \end{document} In scientific documents, it’s a common practice to include a brief overview of the main subject of the paper. In LATEX, the abstract environment is for this purpose. The abstract environment will put the text in a special format at the top of your document. When writing the contents of your document, if you need to start a new paragraph you must hit the “Enter” key twice (to insert a double blank line). Notice that paragraphs have a white space before the first line. To start a new line without actually starting a new paragraph insert a break line point, this can be done by \ (a double backslash as in the example) or the \newline command You can find more information in the Paragraphs and new lines article. For a more complete discussion about document structuring see the article about sections and chapters. 注释有时候我们有必要给 LaTeX 代码加上一些注释来增加代码的可读性. 操作非常简单, 只需要把 % 加到注释之前即可. LaTeX 将会忽略这段文本.123456789101112131415161718192021\documentclass{article}\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc} %codification of the document \usepackage{comment} %Here begins the body of the document\begin{document}This document contains a lot of comments, none of themwill appear here, only this text. This document contains a lot of comments, none of themwill appear here, only this text. \begin{comment}This text won't show up in the compiled pdfthis is just a multi-line comment. Usefulto, for instance, comment out slow-rendering partswhile working on a draft.\end{comment} \end{document} 在这个例子的最后一段, 我们可以看到一个 comment 环境. 这个环境使多行注释变得更容易, 因为使用此环境后我们就不需要在每行都加上 %. 为了让其运行, 我们需要在前言部分加入其对应的宏包:1\usepackage{comment} 符号 % 是一个特殊的预留字符. 如果你想要在文档中输出 %, 请使用命令 \%. 至于预留字符的详情清单, 请看下面的参考文献指南. 参考文献指南Document types available in the \documentclass command. Document type Descriptionarticle For short documents and journal articles. Is the most commonly used.report For longer documents and dissertations.book Useful to write booksletter For lettersslides For slides, rarely usedbeamer Slides in the Beamer class format. See the beamer documentation for a better descriptionReserved characters The following symbol characters are reserved by LATEX because they introduce a command and have a special meaning.1# $ % ^ & _ { } ~ \ These symbols and can be printed with special commands (in some cases - inside mathematical environment). Character Function How to print it# Macro parameter \#$ Math mode \$ % Comment \%^ Superscript (in math mode) \^{} or $\textasciicircum$& Separate column entries in tables \&_ Subscript (in math mode) _{ } Processing block { }~ Unbreakable space, use it whenever you want to leave a space which is unbreakable $\textasciitilde$ or ~{}\ Starting commands, which extend until the first non-alphanumerical character $\textbackslash$ or $\backslash$
